name: Banda Eva
description: '''''Banda Eva''''' is a [[Brazilian music]] group from [[Salvador da Bahia]]. Their current lead singer is [[Felipe Pezzoni]]. The group is notable for being home to superstar singer [[Ivete Sangalo]] for several years at the start of her career, before she departed on a solo career, the band has sold more than 6 million albums. Initially it was a carnival block from Salvador, in the 90s it became a musical group.
